languages.text: "Хейнрикс, к слову о новой спутнице Лорд-капитана... вы же бывали на Футфоле. Нет ли у вас особого, хм... досье на Хейдари?"
"Heinrix, speaking of the Lord Captain's new companion... You have been to Footfall — would you happen to have a special, er... file on Heydari?"
languages.original_text: "Хейнрикс, к слову о новой спутнице Лорд-капитана... вы же бывали на Футфоле. Нет ли у вас особого, хм... досье на Хейдари?"

languages.text: “海因里希，谈到舰长大人的新同伴……既然你去过落脚港，你会不会碰巧有得知某些关于海达利的……呃，特别档案？”
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, speaking of the Lord Captain's new companion... You have been to Footfall — would you happen to have a special, er... file on Heydari?"

traits.locale_text: “海因里希，谈到舰长大人的新同伴……既然你去过落脚港，你会不会碰巧有得知某些关于海达利的……呃，特别档案？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Heinrix, à propos de la nouvelle amie {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}... vous qui étiez sur Castel, vous n'auriez pas un, euh... dossier spécial sur Heydari ? »
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, speaking of the Lord Captain's new companion... You have been to Footfall — would you happen to have a special, er... file on Heydari?"

traits.locale_text: « Heinrix, à propos de la nouvelle amie {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}... vous qui étiez sur Castel, vous n'auriez pas un, euh... dossier spécial sur Heydari ? »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Heinrix, en cuanto a la nueva acompañante de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán... Ha estado en Paso. ¿Tiene algún... archivo especial sobre Heydari?».
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, speaking of the Lord Captain's new companion... You have been to Footfall — would you happen to have a special, er... file on Heydari?"

traits.locale_text: «Heinrix, en cuanto a la nueva acompañante de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán... Ha estado en Paso. ¿Tiene algún... archivo especial sobre Heydari?».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ハインリックス殿、ロード・キャプテンの新たな仲間についてです…フットフォールを訪れたことがあるのでしょう、特別な、その…ひょっとしてヘイダリに関する記録はありませんか？」
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, speaking of the Lord Captain's new companion... You have been to Footfall — would you happen to have a special, er... file on Heydari?"

traits.locale_text: 「ハインリックス、ロード・キャプテンの新たな仲間についてです…フットフォールを訪れたことがあるのでしょう、特別な、その…ひょっとしてヘイダリに関する記録はありませんか？」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Heinrix, wo wir von der neuen Gefährtin des Lord Captains sprechen ... Ihr wart doch auf Footfall. Habt Ihr vielleicht eine spezielle, äh ... Akte zu Heydari?"
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, speaking of the Lord Captain's new companion... You have been to Footfall — would you happen to have a special, er... file on Heydari?"

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, wo wir von der neuen Gefährtin des Lord Captains sprechen ... Ihr wart doch auf Footfall. Habt Ihr vielleicht eine spezielle, äh ... Akte zu Heydari?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Heinrix, speaking of the Lord Captain's new companion... You have been to Footfall — would you happen to have a special, er... file on Heydari?"

languages.text: "Heinrix, hazır Lord Kaptan'ın yeni yoldaşının lafı geçmişken... Binliman'da bulunmuşluğun var. Heydari'yle ilgili özel bir dosyanız var mı?"
languages.original_text: "Heinrix, speaking of the Lord Captain's new companion... You have been to Footfall — would you happen to have a special, er... file on Heydari?"

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, hazır Lord Kaptan'ın yeni yoldaşının lafı geçmişken... Binliman'da bulunmuşluğun var. Heydari'yle ilgili özel bir dosyanız var mı?"
